long_description: With a long runtime and bright white LED, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day flashlight is an essential item to keep in your emergency kit or take along on backpacking trips. Three D batteries (sold separately) provide up to 720 hrs. (that's 30 days!) of use on low and 16 hrs. on high and 15 hrs. on SOS strobe. High-quality CREE XPG LED outputs 300 lumens of light on high and 35 lumens on low. Use the powerful SOS strobe to signal for help. Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day flashlight is made from anodized aircraft-grade aluminum that stands up to hard use in the outdoors. Includes a rubberized handle wrap and on/off button for nonslip grip.
short_description: With a long runtime and bright white LED, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 30-Day flashlight is an essential item to keep in your emergency kit or take along on backpacking trips.
